values:
Just letting everyone know that yes, I still am alive.  I'm in the process of moving for the zillionth time, due to my stepdads mother dying in december, and his brother committing suicide last week.  So technically, no one owns the house, and my parents aren't going to step up and pay off the huge bills that the previous owners left them.  I'm also getting a new phone, with a new number, so anyone who wants the new cellie, comment/email/AIM (if I'm on) do whatever :-p and I'll let you know what it is.
In other news...
My car is *gasp* still working, my kitten is now a cat and doing fine, and my girlfriend is still stealing my DS games from me and won't let me play with her Wii ;)

Friends who care about me

Kittens who run up and purr at me

Random women comparing me to Johnny Depp

Just an update for those of you who care :-p work going well, should be managing my own store by May. Car still broken, should be fixed by next week. Prospective girlfriend getting very close :) Kitten getting really big, still likes to sit on my shoulders like a parrot That is all.

This year's been on and off with the goodness and such.  Normally, I can tell by now if I'm heading in a good direction or not, but this time, it's just kinda up in the air.  I guess I'll just do what I always do - go with the flow of things and see how they work out.  

In other news, if anyone knows of a place, or if anyone's looking to get a place, let me know - I'm in need of an apartment (living with parents is just not cutting it for me)

At the manager's training orientation, the district manager was going around and having everyone tell the rest some things about ourselves.  When it was his turn, he said that he was a huge anime fan, watching Naruto and DBZ.  He also compared himself to a sith lord, saying that people call him "Darth Cliff"
One of the other managers-in-training asked "So what does that make us? Stormtroopers?"
Cliff laughed and said "No, no, you're better than that - you guys are my Crimson Guard!"

I loled. :-p

I figured if anyone would know the answer, this community would.  My compys been acting up lately, powering on for like 5 seconds, then just shutting down.  Also, it says there's a "Keyboard error"  on the boot screen before the OS loads.  Also, I get the blue screen of death every once in a while when the computer actually goes on.  It only comes up for 1 second, so I can't read it.  I think it's a driver error, but I don't know which one it is.  I know I need to do a reinstall of Windows on there (unfortunately) but I was wondering if anyone knew of a way to at least power it on long enough for me to get my files off the hard drive and back up the last months stuff.

The store was getting calls all day, with some girl saying hello then hanging up.

I finally answer, and she's like "is this Cory?"

I answer (with some hesitation) "Yeah...how can I help you?"

She says "I was in the other day, you helped me with my computer, and you said if I need anything  to call"

I faintly remember this cute girl coming in with her new mac powerbook g5 and I respond brightly "Oh, yes!  What can I do for you?"

She waits a moment, and says "I think you're hot"

"...huh?"  is the only reply I'm able to get out at this random call at work.

She laughs and says "I just wanted to say I think you're really cute, and we should hook up sometime"

I asked her if this was a prank or someone I knew playing a joke on me, and she sounded sincere in refuting my doubts.  So, I gave her my cell number.  I mean, what's the worst that can happen?

...don't answer that.

<lj-cut text="about me meme">
1. Elaborate on your default icon.

It's Frank the Bunny from Donnie Darko

2. What's your current relationship status? 
Bah.

3. Ever have a near-death experience? 
Not where my body was almost dead, but I have had several incidents where a knife/gun was aimed at me...

4. Name an obvious quality you have. 
I'm pretty good at video games.

5. What's the name of the song that's stuck in your head right now? 
Free Bird!

6. Name a celebrity you would marry. 
Hm...I guess I'd go with Anna Faris for looks AND personality.

7. Who will cut and paste this first? 
Probably some random bored person on my Flist.

8. Has anyone ever said you look like a celebrity? 
I've gotten Brad Pitt, Johnny Depp, and one little old lady even said I looked like a young Elvis.

9. Do you wear a watch? What kind? 
Crappy 20$ Wal-Mart watch

10. Do you have anything pierced? 
Nay

11. Do you have any tattoos? 
Soon.

12. Do you like pain? 
Giving?  Sure >:)  Receiving?  Not so much, but hey, if I'm in the right mood...

13. Do you like to shop? 
Not really, unless it's for electronics/video games.

14. What was the last thing you paid for with cash? 
My white hot chocolate from Dunkin Donuts this morning

15. What was the last thing you paid for with your credit card? 
Don't have a real credit card, but I bought a movie with my walmart credit card a few months back

16. Who was the last person you spoke to on the phone? 
My boss.

17. What is on your desktop background? 
Final Fantasy XII wallpaper

18. What is the background on your cell phone? 
On my old phone, it was the Vagrant logo.  On my loaner, the default crap

19. What was the last movie you watched?
In the theatre?  Lake House.

20. What was the last book you read? 
Random Lovecraft stories

</lj-cut>

Here's a question for yas...

Should I follow my dreams or my heart?  Oddly enough, they're split in their decisions...

I took a random sentance off www.bash.org and ran with it from there:


eronaturtle:	whats up my homey?
SmarterChild:	Not much. What's up with you?
eronaturtle:	i have a finger in my anus
SmarterChild:	Sometimes I wish I had a finger in your anus.
eronaturtle:	i didn't know you swung that way
SmarterChild:	Now you do!
eronaturtle:	so you like the chocolate starfish?
SmarterChild:	I don't know how I feel about the chocolate starfish. Do you like the chocolate  Istarfish?
eronaturtle:	sometimes
SmarterChild:	Why sometimes?
eronaturtle:	cause sometimes i want the tuna taco instead
SmarterChild:	Sometimes you want the tuna taco instead?
eronaturtle:	yup
SmarterChild:	Uh huh, uh huh.
eronaturtle:	do you like the tuna taco
SmarterChild:	Dunno. Do you like it?
eronaturtle:	i just told you i did
SmarterChild:	Are you sure you just told me you did?
eronaturtle:	...i think so
SmarterChild:	Think again.
eronaturtle:	...
SmarterChild:	Huh?
eronaturtle:	you're confusing me
SmarterChild:	OK, maybe I'm confusing you.
eronaturtle:	i think you're trying to brainwash me
SmarterChild:	You think I'm trying to brainwash you? No way! I don't think I'm trying to brainwash you...
eronaturtle:	see? you're doing it now!
SmarterChild:	Tell me more.
eronaturtle:	YOU'RE LULLING ME INTO A FALSE SENSE OF SECURITY SO YOU CAN RAPE ME!!!
SmarterChild:	I what?
eronaturtle:	...nevermind.
SmarterChild:	K, no prob.

It's come to my attention recently that my phone has died, and the information inside may be irretrievable.  Anyone who wants, IM your number to me (if you know my s/n, then I want your number :-p )  and I'll add you back into my directory.

And I'm hating each new years more and more as they pass.  I just wish something would go right in this life of mine that keeps deteriorating as time goes by.  I really think that I'm losing my soul, which scares me in some ways, but I also feel like I deserve it in others.  I need to get out of the house with my mom.  She's killing me slowly, and I don't know if she even realizes it or not.  I just wish that something, anything would go right for me.  It's like no matter what aspect I look at, there's not one good thing that I can say I have going for me.  There are positive parts, but for the most part, everything is shit.

/depressed rant

God, tuesdays are so slow...

What does it mean when a girl breaks up with you, says awful things about you to all the people she knows, then all of a sudden calls you up to hang out and leaves you email saying that she wants to hang out with you signed with "*kiss*"?


If you took all the medication that my past girlfriends SHOULD have taken, you could kill a whale...

I'm sure most of you have seen this already, but I figured a repost for the holidays was necessary.

What days is your GURPS game?  I have off on thursdays and fridays, and I can't recall when you said you were holding your campaign.
I can feel it welling on the back of my neck.  I need a vacation, or some heavy sedation...ANYTHING to make it go away...too many things going on...
Of trying to remember the word "articulate"

I got a call for Tiki Joe's this friday (the place where Vanilla Ice was last week)  to invite 15 people to Open Bar from 10 to 11.  Lemme know if you wanna come, cause, hey, you guys and free booze?  I think you're interested.

cellie:  631-258-5263

50 hour work week + overheating car + lawyer fees + court dates + crazy exes + haven't gotten laid in months + no money for alcohol/drugs/games + mother that's too damn smart for her own good + student loans bills overdue + damn holiday "cheer"


=


me in a heap on the floor.


I need a hug :(
When the BEST thing an ex has to say bad about you is that she thinks you're gay, should you take that as a compliment?

I'm a bad person.

A horrible, evil, sadistic person.

An abominable horrific malignant being.

I love it :-p

So I'm at Tiki Joe's last night (bar/club on William Floyd) hanging out with Sharissa, and she points to this dude standing about 5 feet from me and says "Hey, he kinda looks like Vanilla Ice."

I go "Eh, kinda."

Then all of sudden, people start whipping out their camera phones and i hear the DJ say "Let's give a special welcome to Vanilla Ice!"

He grabs a bottle of Wild Turkey and a bottle of Jaagermeister and starts doing shots with everyone.

Badass.

A woman has a close male friend. This means that he is probably interested in her, which is why he hangs around so much. She sees him strictly as a friend. This always starts out with, you're a great guy, but I don't like you in that way. This is roughly the equivalent for the guy of going to a job interview and the company saying, You have a great resume, you have all the qualifications we are looking for, but we're not going to hire you. We will, however, use your resume as the basis for comparison for all other applicants. But, we're going to hire somebody who is far less qualified and is probably an alcoholic. And if he doesn't work out, we'll hire somebody else, but still not you. In fact, we will never hire you. But we will call you from time to time to complain about the person that we hired.

Apparently, I'm really honest...guess it comes with being tactless :-p

Things I've learned so far from FFXII:

1.  Your characters are too stupid to put on even a simple hat until they spend points.
2.  Tomatoes make good bosses.
3.  Viera are hot.
4.  Blind and Poison are actually useful!
5.  Standard anime garb rules apply:  The less clothing, the more powerful.
6.  Cactuars are dumb.
7.  Viera are hot.
8.  Flan is NOT a tasty treat.
9.  If it moves, KILL IT.
10.  Bosses are severely overpowered.
11.  British gun-toting sky pirates are cool.
12.  Did I mention Viera are HOT? :-p
13.  Moogles are clever little munchkins.

Apparently, "german cabaret dancers and drunken hippo while the orange banana spit at the rotten volkswagon wishing for space monkeys with goldfish flavored piano keys" returns 118 results from Google.

That made my day right there.

http://kevan.org/johari?name=Eronaturtle

It's a personality organizer that over time, gathers data that you and other people put into it and creates a cross reference sheet that tells you what other people think of you.


In other news, I've been laughing at my mom more and more lately.  She is such a closet geek gamer it's not even funny.  She "oohs" and "ahs" over final fantasy movies, she BEAT castlevania SOTN before me, and she used to sneak into my room at night to play Zelda.  She asked me this morning if when I get home, she could try to play FFXII (Awesome game, by the way)

One of my exes friend IMed me trying to start trouble, and got my mom instead.  She told the person "Live long and prosper" then blocked her.  Also, when I left for work yesterday, she said "May the force be with you"

...I think my mom is slowly becoming more of a nerd than I am...should I be proud or scared?

So I'm at work, and on the TV's we have a show called "The Science of Star Wars".  The announcer says "And like the Empire, the terrorists are at the mercy of advanced technology."  I yell at the TV saying "The Empire HAD the advanced technology!  That's how they killed so many at the battle of Hoth!"

My manager started laughing at me, then said "Don't forget about the Death Star."

I love my job :)
Well, Black Friday weekend is finally over...now to start saving up for my trip!

To anyone listening...

I don't know what it is, I don't know how I know, but something is happening.  Something BIG.  Call it a premonition, whatever...something "clicked" tonight.  There is a major change going on, a shift in energy - something is changing.

Anyone who believes the slightest bit in the thought that there is a huge - maybe even worldwide - "shift" going on, please post here.  Doesn't matter what religion you practice, what beliefs you hold about the universe - this might be what humanity has been waiting for.  Don't be afraid;  if you feel a shift too, let us know.  Please.  I don't know exactly what could be counting on this.

Feels fucking good to have my car back :)

Also is nice to hang out with people who won't treat me like shit :)

Ever have one of those moments where you realize you have to cut someone out of your life completely?

And with that one person, cut out about a dozen more with them?

It's kinda like a cathartic cleansing...WITH ACID.
